languages.text: "Сообщения рваные и неточные, много криков и истерических заявлений. Есть данные о жертвах и волнениях. Отсек уже изолирован, однако я подумала, что вы захотите лично разобраться в происходящем. Ситуация деликатная и... что особенно тревожно... среди сообщений есть упоминание о присутствии в отсеке Идиры Тласс".

traits.locale_text: "Сообщения неточные, есть данные о жертвах и волнениях. Отсек уже изолирован, однако я подумала, что вы захотите лично разобраться в происходящем. Ситуация деликатная и... помимо прочего, среди сообщений есть упоминание о присутствии в отсеке Идиры Тласс".

languages.text: "The messages we have received are incomplete and vague, little more than yelling and hysterical claims. There are reports of casualties and unrest. The compartment in question has already been sealed off, but I thought you might want to look into what's going on for yourself. The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... there are mentions of Idira Tlass being present at the scene."
languages.original_text: "Сообщения рваные и неточные, много криков и истерических заявлений. Есть данные о жертвах и волнениях. Отсек уже изолирован, однако я подумала, что вы захотите лично разобраться в происходящем. Ситуация деликатная и... что особенно тревожно... среди сообщений есть упоминание о присутствии в отсеке Идиры Тласс".

traits.locale_text: "The reports are incomplete and inaccurate, there is a lot of screams and hysterical statements. There are reports of casualties and unrest. The compartment is already isolated, but I thought you might want to look into what's going on for yourself. The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... Reports mention Idira Tlass being present on spot."

"The reports are incomplete and inaccurate, there is a lot of screams and hysterical statements. There are reports of casualties and unrest. The compartment is already isolated, but I thought you might want to look into what's going on for yourself. The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... Reports mention Idira Tlass being present on spot."

The compartment in question has already been sealed off, but I thought you might want to look into what's going on for yourself. The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... there are mentions of Idira Tlass being present at the scene."

The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... there are mentions of Idira Tlass being present at the scene."

"The messages we have received are incomplete and vague, little more than yelling and hysterical claims. There are reports of casualties and unrest. The compartment in question has already been sealed off, but I thought you might want to look into what's going on for yourself. The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... there are mentions of Idira Tlass being present at the scene."

languages.text: “我们收到的信息非常模糊，只提到现场有人大喊大叫，还歇斯底里地发疯。此外，还收到了关于伤亡和动乱的报告。我们已经封锁了相关区域，但我想，您可能想要亲自去看看究竟发生了什么事情。现场的情况很微妙，而且……令人尤为不安的是……报告中提到，伊迪拉·特拉斯也在现场。”
languages.original_text: "The messages we have received are incomplete and vague, little more than yelling and hysterical claims. There are reports of casualties and unrest. The compartment in question has already been sealed off, but I thought you might want to look into what's going on for yourself. The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... there are mentions of Idira Tlass being present at the scene."

traits.locale_text: “我们收到的信息非常模糊，只提到现场有人大喊大叫，还歇斯底里地发疯。此外，还收到了关于伤亡和动乱的报告。我们已经封锁了相关区域，但我想，您可能想要亲自去看看究竟发生了什么事情。现场的情况很微妙，而且……令人尤为不安的是……报告中提到，伊迪拉·特拉斯也在现场。”

languages.text: «Los mensajes que recibimos son incompletos y vagos, poco más que gritos y afirmaciones histéricas. Nos llegan informes de bajas y de disturbios. Hemos sellado el compartimento en cuestión, pero he pensado que tal vez le gustaría investigar la situación personalmente. Es un asunto delicado y... esta es la parte más perturbadora... se menciona que Idira Tlass estaba presente».
languages.original_text: "The messages we have received are incomplete and vague, little more than yelling and hysterical claims. There are reports of casualties and unrest. The compartment in question has already been sealed off, but I thought you might want to look into what's going on for yourself. The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... there are mentions of Idira Tlass being present at the scene."

traits.locale_text: «Los mensajes que recibimos son incompletos y vagos, poco más que gritos y afirmaciones histéricas. Nos llegan informes de bajas y de disturbios. Hemos sellado el compartimento en cuestión, pero he pensado que tal vez le gustaría investigar la situación personalmente. Es un asunto delicado y... esta es la parte más perturbadora... se menciona que Idira Tlass estaba presente».

languages.text: "Die Nachrichten, die wir erhalten haben, sind unvollständig und vage, kaum mehr als Geschrei und hysterische Behauptungen. Es gibt Berichte über Verletzte und Unruhen. Die betreffende Abteilung wurde bereits abgeriegelt, aber ich dachte, Ihr wollt Euch vielleicht selbst ein Bild von den Vorgängen machen. Die Situation ist heikel und ... was besonders beunruhigend ist ... es gibt Hinweise auf die Anwesenheit von Idira Tlass am Tatort."
languages.original_text: "The messages we have received are incomplete and vague, little more than yelling and hysterical claims. There are reports of casualties and unrest. The compartment in question has already been sealed off, but I thought you might want to look into what's going on for yourself. The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... there are mentions of Idira Tlass being present at the scene."

traits.locale_text: "The messages we have received are incomplete and vague, little more than yelling and hysterical claims. There are reports of casualties and unrest. The compartment in question has already been sealed off, but I thought you might want to look into what's going on for yourself. The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... there are mentions of Idira Tlass being present at the scene."

languages.text: « Les messages reçus sont vagues et incomplets, il s'agit essentiellement de cris et d'affirmations hystériques. Les rapports font également état de victimes et d'une agitation croissante. Le compartiment en question est déjà scellé, mais j'ai pensé que vous souhaiteriez peut-être vous pencher personnellement sur ce problème, car la situation est préoccupante et pour ne rien arranger... on signale la présence sur place d'Idira Tlass. »
languages.original_text: "The messages we have received are incomplete and vague, little more than yelling and hysterical claims. There are reports of casualties and unrest. The compartment in question has already been sealed off, but I thought you might want to look into what's going on for yourself. The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... there are mentions of Idira Tlass being present at the scene."

traits.locale_text: « Les messages reçus sont vagues et incomplets, il s'agit essentiellement de cris et d'affirmations hystériques. Les rapports font également état de victimes et d'une agitation croissante. Le compartiment en question est déjà scellé, mais j'ai pensé que vous souhaiteriez peut-être vous pencher personnellement sur ce problème, car la situation est préoccupante et pour ne rien arranger... on signale la présence sur place d'Idira Tlass. »

languages.text: 「届いたメッセージは欠けている部分があり曖昧で、ヒステリックに大騒ぎしているだけという印象です。死傷者が出て不穏な動きもあると報告がありました。問題の区画はすでに封鎖済みですが、陛下ご自身で何が起こっているか調べたいのではないでしょうか。慎重を要する状況で、特に気がかりなのは…イディラ・タラースが現場にいたという報告です」
languages.original_text: "The messages we have received are incomplete and vague, little more than yelling and hysterical claims. There are reports of casualties and unrest. The compartment in question has already been sealed off, but I thought you might want to look into what's going on for yourself. The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... there are mentions of Idira Tlass being present at the scene."

traits.locale_text: 「届いたメッセージは欠けている部分があり曖昧で、ヒステリックに大騒ぎしているだけという印象です。死傷者が出て不穏な動きもあると報告がありました。問題の区画はすでに封鎖済みですが、陛下ご自身で何が起こっているか調べたいのではないでしょうか。慎重を要する状況で、特に気がかりなのは…イディラ・タラースが現場にいたという報告です」

languages.text: "Aldığımız mesajlar yarım ve muğlaktı, bağırmalardan ve histerik iddialardan çok da farklı değildi. Kayıplar verildiğine ve huzursuzluğun arttığına dair raporlar var. Söz konusu kompartıman karantinaya alındı ama neler olup bittiğine bizzat göz atmak isteyeceğinizi düşündüm. Son derece hassas bir konu ve... Özellikle rahatsız edici olan şey... İdira Tlass'ın da orada bulunduğuna dair söylentiler var."
languages.original_text: "The messages we have received are incomplete and vague, little more than yelling and hysterical claims. There are reports of casualties and unrest. The compartment in question has already been sealed off, but I thought you might want to look into what's going on for yourself. The situation is delicate and... what's especially disturbing... there are mentions of Idira Tlass being present at the scene."
